name: Robert from IT
description:
(If it runs bad on browser, consider downloading the Windows build)

Tie or Die

You are Robert, an IT technician working in the company for a few years now. Josh, your dumb colleague, ask you to go to HR to tell them about problems in work environment.

Throw your CTRL keys at your coworkers. When you are out of CTRL you can get them back by walking on them.

This game is a 15min adventure with a lot of dialogues.

Controls
  • Move: WASD or arrow keys (on browser, using wasd can show problems, because you will use CTRL key in the same time, so it will try to save the web page 🙄)
  • Throw ctrl keys: left or right CTRL
Credits
  • Music: Simon "Zebu" Gigant
  • Art: Simon "Zebu" Gigant
  • Programming: Simon "Zebu" Gigant
  • Game Design: Simon "Zebu" Gigant
  • Level Design: Simon "Zebu" Gigant

(that's it, I was solo dev)

Made for the #GMTKJam 2020 in 48h
